00044 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD::fmat4x4SIMD()
00045 {
00046 #ifndef GLM_SIMD_ENABLE_DEFAULT_INIT
00047         this->Data[0] = fvec4SIMD(1.0f, 0, 0, 0);
00048         this->Data[1] = fvec4SIMD(0, 1.0f, 0, 0);
00049         this->Data[2] = fvec4SIMD(0, 0, 1.0f, 0);
00050         this->Data[3] = fvec4SIMD(0, 0, 0, 1.0f);
00051 #endif
00052 }
00053 
00054 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD::fmat4x4SIMD(float const & s)
00055 {
00056         this->Data[0] = fvec4SIMD(s, 0, 0, 0);
00057         this->Data[1] = fvec4SIMD(0, s, 0, 0);
00058         this->Data[2] = fvec4SIMD(0, 0, s, 0);
00059         this->Data[3] = fvec4SIMD(0, 0, 0, s);
00060 }

00062 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD::fmat4x4SIMD
00063 (
00064         float const & x0, float const & y0, float const & z0, float const & w0,
00065         float const & x1, float const & y1, float const & z1, float const & w1,
00066         float const & x2, float const & y2, float const & z2, float const & w2,
00067         float const & x3, float const & y3, float const & z3, float const & w3
00068 )
00069 {
00070         this->Data[0] = fvec4SIMD(x0, y0, z0, w0);
00071         this->Data[1] = fvec4SIMD(x1, y1, z1, w1);
00072         this->Data[2] = fvec4SIMD(x2, y2, z2, w2);
00073         this->Data[3] = fvec4SIMD(x3, y3, z3, w3);
00074 }

00161 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD & fmat4x4SIMD::operator/= 
00162 (
00163         fmat4x4SIMD const & m
00164 )
00165 {
00166         __m128 Inv[4];
00167         sse_inverse_ps(&m.Data[0].Data, Inv);
00168         sse_mul_ps(&this->Data[0].Data, Inv, &this->Data[0].Data);
00169         return *this;
00170 }

00211 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD & fmat4x4SIMD::operator/= 
00212 (
00213         float const & s
00214 )
00215 {
00216         __m128 Operand = _mm_div_ps(one, _mm_set_ps1(s));
00217         this->Data[0].Data = _mm_mul_ps(this->Data[0].Data, Operand);
00218         this->Data[1].Data = _mm_mul_ps(this->Data[1].Data, Operand);
00219         this->Data[2].Data = _mm_mul_ps(this->Data[2].Data, Operand);
00220         this->Data[3].Data = _mm_mul_ps(this->Data[3].Data, Operand);
00221         return *this;
00222 }

00225 {
00226         this->Data[0].Data = _mm_add_ps(this->Data[0].Data, one);
00227         this->Data[1].Data = _mm_add_ps(this->Data[1].Data, one);
00228         this->Data[2].Data = _mm_add_ps(this->Data[2].Data, one);
00229         this->Data[3].Data = _mm_add_ps(this->Data[3].Data, one);
00230         return *this;

00237         this->Data[2].Data = _mm_sub_ps(this->Data[2].Data, one);

00430 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fmat4x4SIMD inverse(detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & m)
00431 {
00432         detail::fmat4x4SIMD result;
00433         detail::sse_inverse_ps(&m[0].Data, &result[0].Data);
00434         return result;

00440         fvec4SIMD const & v

00454 
00455 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER fmat4x4SIMD operator/
00456 (
00457         const fmat4x4SIMD &m1,
00458         const fmat4x4SIMD &m2
00459 )
00460 {
00461         __m128 result[4];
00462         __m128 inv[4];
00463 
00464         sse_inverse_ps(&m2.Data[0].Data, inv);
00465         sse_mul_ps(&m1.Data[0].Data, inv, result);
00466 
00467         return fmat4x4SIMD(result);
00468 }

00518 
00519 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER mat4 mat4_cast
00520 (
00521         detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & x
00522 )
00523 {
00524         GLM_ALIGN(16) mat4 Result;
00525         _mm_store_ps(&Result[0][0], x.Data[0].Data);
00526         _mm_store_ps(&Result[1][0], x.Data[1].Data);
00527         _mm_store_ps(&Result[2][0], x.Data[2].Data);
00528         _mm_store_ps(&Result[3][0], x.Data[3].Data);
00529         return Result;
00530 }
00531 
00532 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fmat4x4SIMD matrixCompMult
00533 (
00534         detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & x,
00535         detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & y
00536 )
00537 {
00538         detail::fmat4x4SIMD result;
00539         result[0] = x[0] * y[0];
00540         result[1] = x[1] * y[1];
00541         result[2] = x[2] * y[2];
00542         result[3] = x[3] * y[3];
00543         return result;
00544 }
00545 
00546 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fmat4x4SIMD outerProduct
00547 (
00548         detail::fvec4SIMD const & c,
00549         detail::fvec4SIMD const & r
00550 )
00551 {
00552         __m128 Shu0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(r.Data, r.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 0, 0, 0));
00553         __m128 Shu1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(r.Data, r.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 1, 1, 1));
00554         __m128 Shu2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(r.Data, r.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 2, 2, 2));
00555         __m128 Shu3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(r.Data, r.Data, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 3, 3, 3));
00556 
00557         detail::fmat4x4SIMD result(detail::fmat4x4SIMD::_null);
00558         result[0].Data = _mm_mul_ps(c.Data, Shu0);
00559         result[1].Data = _mm_mul_ps(c.Data, Shu1);
00560         result[2].Data = _mm_mul_ps(c.Data, Shu2);
00561         result[3].Data = _mm_mul_ps(c.Data, Shu3);
00562         return result;
00563 }
00564 
00565 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::fmat4x4SIMD transpose(detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & m)
00566 {
00567         detail::fmat4x4SIMD result;
00568         detail::sse_transpose_ps(&m[0].Data, &result[0].Data);
00569         return result;
00570 }
00571 
00572 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float determinant(detail::fmat4x4SIMD const & m)
00573 {
00574         float Result;
00575         _mm_store_ss(&Result, detail::sse_det_ps(&m[0].Data));
00576         return Result;
00577 }
